name: Bot Revolt
overview:
Bot Revolt stops bots from accessing your computer about every .002 seconds. The software was created by the Spam Revolt company as a way to proactively fight in the war against Cyber Security.

What make bot revolt such a great safety tool for you computer is: Unlike antiviruses Bot Revolt continuously runs so there is no need for updating or long slow scans to bog down your computer.

Bot Revolt has a growing database that it updates daily, and as of date the software automatically blocks over 1 Billion known malicious threats.

For anyone asking ” how does bot revolt work ?” The team has put together a free trial ( no credit card required )

Almost instantly users get to see in real-time how this botnet protection software works to keep their computer safe.
